article: I was reading a notice at the entrance to my college dormitory, when a girl came up to me and said, "Do you  _  a quarter? I'm one short of putting my laundry in the dryer . "Why are you giving this to me?" I asked,  _  . "Oh, because you were kind to me, so I'm just giving back the  _  ." It's just a dollar, but I felt it was  _  . Giving and  _  don't usually happen hand-in-hand,  _  when it does, like it did this time, it makes one think about why generosity is so powerful in the first place.
